summary:
## The Mysterious Death of Elisa Lam

Elisa Lam, a Canadian tourist, went missing in Los Angeles in January 2013. Her body was later found in a hotel water tank. Before her death, security cameras showed her acting strangely in an elevator.

The cause of her death was ruled an accident, linked to her bipolar disorder. The case gained worldwide attention and was compared to a horror movie. It has since been featured in various media.
title: Death of Elisa Lam
